On Wed, 17 Apr 2002 17:08:11 +0530, arathi.bhaskar@... said:
> This message only has an HTML part -- this is a text generated representation
> 
> 
>    Hi
>    I am familiar with Junit for a month or two month. I have also started
>    to
>    look into Cactus project for servlet testing. I am one of the very few
>    people in the organization to know about this & want to share Junit's
>    features  &  advantages with others & convince them of its use. I have
>    tested
>    some Java programs with Junit. I gave a presentation to my managar, to
>    see
>    if we can pilot the use of Junit in some project.
>    Can someone tell me the real advantages of using Junit over the
>    individual's  own Unit testing of the Java Code written by him. I have
>    been
>    reading the articles posted on Junit homepage. Where can I find more
>    articles giving the advantages of Junit.
>    Thanks & Regards
>    Arathi
